text: Hey all, does anyone have an issue with favicons disappearing on them? I have a client and it looks like the favicon got unassigned without anyone changing it.
Also nice to meet you all, first post here! :+1:
happened to me also, but no idea why

There appears to be an issue in the old design manager when editing a rich text module inside a global group.

The contents are not showing in the wysiwyg editor
<https://spin.d.pr/odUb4E>

refreshing fixed it - but probably good to still let people know

Hi <@U5BGUA4BX>, hope you had a good weekend. I don't think I'm personally able to help (to give context... my background/focus is in program management and community... this question is too specific for me to be much help).
I know some of the product folks you tagged are out of the office (likely why they haven't replied).

Either way, I'm going to take note of this and make sure I communicate it to the team. There's likely some research and potentially bigger questions related to the marketer/dev experience that need to get answered.
Having an agency background myself, I can see how it would be frustrating.

Thanks for the reply, <@U22PKFRU5>, itâ€™s appreciated. Let me know if you hear anything from the team regarding this.

I fixed the examples of this on sites I could catch by using the target attribute, but cloned one that demonstrates the issue, should you need to pass a concrete example over: <https://www.cometfi.com/what-is-student-loan-refinancing-0?hs_preview=iWEOOdmj-5982508431>. As you can see, the form gets rendered below the footer.
Hey just noticed when you clone a module it appears the condition field may not properly copy to the cloned module.
So anyone else getting cloudflare issues?
Looks like a oneoff error in Cloudflare's edge server
